sentence.Network_en: Rice flour makes the cake less likely to crumble.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种糕饼用米粉做不那么容易碎。

sentence.Network_en: Brighton have too many experienced players to crumble just because we are in town.
sentence.Network_cn: 布赖顿队有很多经验丰富的队员，他们不会因为我们在城里就丧失斗志。

sentence.Network_en: He is a skilled and ruthless leader who isn't likely to crumble under pressure.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是个经验丰富、冷酷无情的领导，不会被压力击垮。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: probably from an Old English word related to crumb

entry.def: If something crumbles, or if you crumble it, it breaks into a lot of small pieces.

example.ex: Under the pressure, the flint crumbled into fragments...
example.tran: 燧石在压力的作用下碎成了小块。

example.ex: Roughly crumble the cheese into a bowl.
example.tran: 把干酪大致弄碎，装入一只碗内。

entry.def: If an old building or piece of land is crumbling, parts of it keep breaking off.

example.ex: The high and low-rise apartment blocks built in the 1960s are crumbling...
example.tran: 20世纪60年代建造的高低不一的公寓楼群正在逐渐破损坍塌。

example.ex: The cliffs were estimated to be crumbling into the sea at the rate of 10ft an hour.
example.tran: 预计那处悬崖会以每小时10英尺的速度坍塌坠入大海。

entry.tran: (体系、关系或希望等)崩溃，瓦解，消亡
entry.def: If something such as a system, relationship, or hope crumbles, it comes to an end.

example.ex: Their economy crumbled under the weight of United Nations sanctions...
example.tran: 在联合国制裁的重压之下，他们的经济崩溃了。

example.ex: The traditional marriage is crumbling fast...

entry.tran: 不再抵抗;放弃奋斗;无力应付
entry.def: If someone crumbles, they stop resisting or trying to win, or become unable to cope.

example.ex: Brighton have too many experienced players to crumble just because we are in town...
example.tran: 布赖顿队有很多经验丰富的队员，他们不会因为我们在城里就丧失斗志。

example.ex: He is a skilled and ruthless leader who isn't likely to crumble under pressure.
example.tran: 他是个经验丰富、冷酷无情的领导，不会被压力击垮。

entry.def: A crumble is a baked pudding made from fruit covered with a mixture of flour, butter, and sugar.

means.word_mean: 2. break or fall apart into fragments;

sentences.en: He crumbled the bread in his fingers.
Our hopes crumbled when the business went bankrupt.
sentences.cn: 商行破产了, 我们的希望也破灭了。

jushi.english: Our hopes crumbled when the business went bankrupt.
jushi.chinese: 商行破产了,我们的希望也破灭了。

jushi.english: Opposition to the new law soon crumbled.
jushi.chinese: 反对新法律的势力很快就瓦解了。
